Reviews.Title: “I love the property and rooms..... I just wished the front desk staff matched the hotel”
Reviews.Author: sandiegojeffy
Reviews.Content: love hotel nice class starwood platinum guest expect little extra care hotel stay upgrade moms birthday told sold upgrades site told sale type offended lied called starwood investigated short excuse computer error decided try love property am running trying charge 200000 upgrade simply read reviews sites upgrade platinum metro suites perfect staff matched quality property excused fault told time staying told told upgrade suite send sort apology little birthday gift mom actually feel cared tell love staff snooty

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and good service”

Reviews.Content: returned stay st regis san francisco return day enjoyed evening suite time lower floor view rave excellent bed linen class comfortable hotel spa appointed ive nicer spas masseuse garlic breath taxi dinner doorman offered hotels own car nice fun service hotel prompt excellent hotels drawback hotels location union square posters suggested blocks prefer hotel nob hill prefer hotel character st regis modern lacks character ultra masculine decor softened bit homey st regis hotel youre visiting san francisco st regis disappoint
